title: Customized Virtual Library Utilization Training for Working Professionals: Real-Time Online Information Search Workshop

context.prior_knowledge: Basic Smartphone Usage Skills and Experience in Document Retrieval in Workplace Settings
context.additional_context: Customized Education Utilizing Real-Time Video Conferencing Tools in Smartphone-Centric Limited-Technology Environments

learning_goals: Learners can extract job-related materials with 80% accuracy using keyword search strategies in a virtual library interface
Learners can solve information-seeking problems by interacting in real-time with librarians through online reference services (chat/video)
Learners can select workplace-relevant information by applying digital resource evaluation criteria (credibility, currency, relevance)

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
